definitions.title: n.pr.div.
definitions.body: of [[סְפַרְוַיִם]] (q. v.) 2Ki 17:31, Anhmelex (om. LXXL); = As. Anu-malik acc. to Schr:COT ad loc., but dub., v. Kit:ad loc. and reff.; Che:Expos. Times, June, 1898, 429 rds. [[ענומלך]], and ins. also 2Ki 19:37 (bef. [[אלהיו]]); cf. also Hal cited sub [[עֲנׇת]].
